channel.title: [PI]Divine spirit shield effect
channel.description: Does anybody here know how to add the Divine spirit shield effect on a project insanity source?

item.title: [PI]Divine spirit shield effect
item.dc:creator: @k1ng0frs k1ng0frs
item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

[code]public void dealDamage(int damage) {
if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 13740) { // Divine Spirit Shield Effect
if(prayerPoint > 0) {
double damageRecieved = damage * 0.7;
int prayerLost = (int) (damage * 0.5);
if(prayerPoint >= prayerLost) {
damage = (int) damageRecieved;
prayerPoint -= prayerLost;
if(prayerPoint < 0)
prayerPoint = 0;
}
}
}
if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 15026) { // Elysian Spirit Shield Effect
if(Misc.random(9) <= 6) {
damage *= 0.75;
}
}
if (teleTimer <= 0)
playerLevel[3] -= damage;
else {
if (hitUpdateRequired)
hitUpdateRequired = false;
if (hitUpdateRequired2)
hitUpdateRequired2 = false;
}

} [/code]

don’t ask me where to put this…

credits to kataang

Read full topic
